page.title: 10FOOTBALL AT LILLESHALL HALL
page.content: {Football}is a popular sport in the 20th.Century it attracts many fans.In our domesday area we have a sports centre called{Lilleshall National {Sports Centre}there is a football pitch that is made out of Astro Turf. {Telford United}train there.Teenage boys who have good footballing skills are sent to{Lilleshall Hall}from all over the country for special coaching they live in the centre and go to school at{Shifnal.}If you wanted you could hire the Astro Turf for a friendly game with another team.
